TextDecoderStreamFatal.summary: The fatal read-only property of the interface is a {{jsxref("boolean")}} indicating if the error mode of the TextDecoderStream object is set to fatal.

remarks.para:
If the property is true then a decoder will throw a if it encounters malformed data while decoding.
If false the decoder will substitute the invalid data with the replacement character U+FFFD (ï¿½).
The value of the property is set in the TextDecoderStream() constructor.

TextDecoderStreamFatal.value:
A which will return true if the error mode is set to "fatal".
Otherwise it returns false, indicating that the error mode is "replacement".
